translation.en: Sometimes when I first wake up,
my heart is racing and my throat is dry.
Can't figure out if the pills are making the dreams more real
translation.ko: 약 때문에 꿈이 더 생생한 건지

translation.en: or the reason they're not worse.
translation.ko: 아니면 더 나쁘진 않은 건지 모르겠어

translation.en: Even on good days, I still feel like I don't fit in.
translation.ko: 기분이 좋은 날에도 여전히 겉도는 느낌이야

translation.en: Like everyone else has it all figured out.
translation.ko: 남들은 뭘 원하는지 이미 아는 것 같아

translation.en: -You were almost out. -Already? Are you feeling okay?
translation.ko: - 거의 다 떨어졌더라 - 벌써? 몸은 괜찮아?

translation.en: Of course I'm not fine and they know it.
They just want me to say it out loud.
Because that would be the end of everything
and I'm not ready for whatever comes next.
It's been three weeks since your birthday.
We know you're nervous but we both think that it's time you--
translation.ko: 긴장되겠지만 이제 때가 된 것 같아

translation.en: Elinor, have you been out all night?
If I'm home now, does it really matter?
It does when you work for me.
One day, I, too, will be a self-confident, bull-by-the-horns kind of girl
translation.ko: 언젠가 나도 자신감 넘치는 당당한 여자가 돼서

translation.en: who doesn't give a shit what my parents think.
translation.ko: 부모님 눈치 따위 개나 줄 거야

translation.en: [sighs] Juliette, could you please remind Ben that we have a doorbell?
One day, I am going to kill him.
You are the prettiest peach I ever seen.
Well, aren't you just the sweetest thing?
[Juliette] Ben Wheeler is the kind of boy you fall in love with.
translation.ko: 벤 휠러는 사랑에 빠질 만한 남자야

translation.en: We've been jumping around in dirty puddles
translation.ko: 우리는 어릴 때부터 더러운 웅덩이에서 뛰어놀고

translation.en: and reading every book on my mother's shelf since we were born.
translation.ko: 엄마 책장에서 책이란 책은 다 읽었어

translation.en: We dated for a month when we were 12.
The star athlete who gets invited to all the parties.
when I'm with Ben, I blend in.
The headaches are still raging but nobody knows,
because he makes me feel and look normal.
And fun and sexy, but I don't wanna try too hard.
translation.ko: 재미있고 섹시하지만 너무 매달리고 싶지 않아

translation.en: Hey, lots of people like this face.
translation.ko: 내 얼굴 좋아하는 사람이 얼마나 많은데

translation.en: Noah Harrington's confused, but he'll come out.
translation.ko: 아직 자기가 게이인 거 몰라서 그래

translation.en: [voice slows, distorts] Stay out of the sun.
So I'll pick you up at 9:00?
At Noah's. You promised you'd go.
Why would I do that? I hate parties.
But you love me and you have to go.
[clears throat] Look, far be it from me to stand in the way of quiet pining,
translation.ko: 네 은밀한 짝사랑을 방해할 생각은 없지만

translation.en: but, you know, you could just talk to her.
♪ I look into your eyes I feel my pulse, begin to wonder ♪
♪ Love me like a river Hold my breath, I'm going under ♪
Okay. Why don't you just start with something small, like your name?
We could do a whole Cyrano thing where I could be doing the--
Got that Prada jacket. I'll go vintage on the bottom
so I don't look like a label whore. Watch out!
[Calliope] I'm sorry. That was my fault.
Oh, I just mean I like Calliope.
You should meet my brothers Theseus and Apollo.
My friend Ben is making me go.
But I promised I'd go so...
If you decide to go too, then maybe I'll see you?
I think that only works with eyelashes.
translation.ko: 그건 속눈썹일 때 하는 거 아니야?

translation.en: But I guess I'll see you in English first.
translation.ko: 그 전에 영어 수업 때 보자

translation.en: You don't wanna miss this one.
I hope that's a love letter to Flannery O'Connor.
the world is a little sharper.
just when I think it's too much,
Ms. Burns. I know you just transferred in,
but surely clocks work the same way at your old school.
Since you're already up, I'm sure you won't mind getting us started.
[Calliope] "Hazel Motes sat at a forward angle on the green, plush train seat."
translation.ko: '헤이즐 모츠는 열차 앞쪽 초록 천 의자에 앉았다'

translation.en: "Looking one minute at the window as if he might wanna jump out of it,
and the next down the aisle at the other end of the car."
"The train was racing through tree tops..."
Why do you show up now?
I can't shake the fear that as soon as I blink,
translation.ko: 눈을 깜빡이는 순간 네가 사라질까 봐

translation.en: and the few hogs nosing in the furrows looked like large, spotted stones."
translation.ko: '고랑을 헤집는 돼지는 큰 점박이 돌처럼 보였다'

translation.en: Setting is never just a backdrop in a story.
often the first one we meet.
Like I know we're going to happen.
It's silly, but when you're swimming around in my head like this,
translation.ko: 우습게도 네가 내 머릿속을 휘젓고 다니면

translation.en: Somehow, an hour goes by in five minutes.
-[school bell rings] -[Mr. Porter] Essays due on Wednesday.
Mark the dates on your phones.
That's what those calendar apps are for.
You coming tonight? Brad's gonna come, right?
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에 올 거지? 브래드도 오겠지?

translation.en: He has to come. He's bringing beer.
I haven't told anyone, of course.
So why do I keep wishing I could tell you?
There's a party tonight at Noah Harrington's
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에 노아 해링턴네 집에서 파티가 있는데

translation.en: so I wanted to see if I could go.
Please tell me the night terrors haven't started.
Then I don't see why not.
They clearly aren't effective anymore. Your body is changing.
translation.ko: 네 몸이 변하니 별로 효과도 없고

translation.en: We shouldn't have let her wait this long.
Sweetie, I know that it's scary.
No. No, it's not scary. It's wrong.
-I don't know why I have to! -Because every day you don't,
you put yourself and this entire family at risk.
translation.ko: 너와 이 가족 전체가 위험에 빠지니까

translation.en: There are humans trained to hunt and kill us.
translation.ko: 우리를 사냥하고 죽이도록 훈련받은 인간들이 있어

translation.en: Your father has made it safe for us in Savannah, as safe as he can,
but we survived by our commitment to blending in.
translation.ko: 인간과 어울리는 게 우리의 생존 전략이야

translation.en: And every day that you refuse to embrace your nature,
you are closer to the day where it controls you.
The day that you kill recklessly because you simply must feed.
Oh, no. What did you do this time, Jules?
I just wanted to go to a party.
Is that what you plan to wear?
Come with me. We can do better.
As soon as you take your talons out of my arm.
You know, it's okay to be nervous, sweet little.
Your first kill's a big step.
-What if I don't wanna change? -You're already changing.
Which is why the pills aren't working.
The kill just kind of tips the scale.
You know, he barely even fought back.
I think some people prefer to die young.
translation.ko: 어떤 사람들은 일찍 죽고 싶나 봐

translation.en: The right hair jewelry and a perfect big juicy carotid artery.
translation.ko: 적당한 머리핀과 피가 넘치는 경동맥만 있으면

translation.en: You are going to have so much fun.
Just go out there and find someone.
Does your throat feel like it's on fire yet?

translation.ko: 피를 마시고 싶어 죽을 것 같아?

translation.en: You keep putting this off, it's only going to get worse.
translation.ko: 계속 시간 끌면 더 심해질 거야

translation.en: and always finish what you start.
Wait, what? No. I'm supposed to be your wingwoman.
Yeah. Time for you to learn how to fly.
Wow, okay. Not wasting any time, huh?
And have wanted to do that for a while now.
And would like to do it again.
[Calliope] I think a lot about how the world treats teenage girls.
translation.ko: 세상이 어떻게 10대 소녀를 대하는지 자주 생각해

translation.en: Like, everything that's good about us is a weakness.
our empathy, means we need to be protected.
translation.ko: 공감 능력 때문에 보호받아야 하는 존재가 돼

translation.en: -Want me to drop you off at school? -I'm good.
like they know I have all the potential in the world,
but I have a lot to learn.
All I know is I'm ready to prove to them what I'm capable of.
translation.ko: 하지만 내 능력을 보여줄 준비가 됐어

translation.en: It's not easy to make friends
when you know you'll be in a new city in a few months.
translation.ko: 새 도시로 이사 갈 텐데 친구 만드는 게 쉽지 않지

translation.en: So head up, shoulders back, smile politely.
translation.ko: 고개 들고 어깨 펴고 공손하게 웃어

translation.en: [Calliope] Every day, I just go through the day so I can get back home,
to the only place I feel normal. With my family.
When my parents first started hunting,
For years, every time I'd close my eyes,
translation.ko: 몇 년 동안 눈을 감을 때마다

translation.en: Ones with claws as long as steak knives,
That was before I learned the worst ones always look human.
translation.ko: 근데 가장 악질은 인간과 똑같이 생겼지

translation.en: I learned that from JoJo when I was 3.
She's the first Guild Guardian I ever met.
My parents were on assignment in Paris at the time.
The Guardians were doing what I've seen them do so many times now:
translation.ko: 수호자가 일하는 걸 난 수도 없이 봤어

translation.en: warding off monsters and evil spirits
with special candles, bunches of sage,
I don't know how I unpacked all those boxes so quickly.
translation.ko: 그 많은 짐을 어떻게 그렇게 빨리 풀었나 몰라

translation.en: Where do you wanna put this one?
Rituals: A sequence of important activities,
In other words, get your narrow ass out my way
so I can do my job right.
And saying my name like that isn't gonna make me not wanna go.
translation.ko: 내 이름 그렇게 부른다고 내가 안 갈 것 같아?

translation.en: Out at Colonial Park Cemetery. Get back in the house, we gotta go.
translation.ko: 콜로니얼 공원묘지로 갈 거야 넌 집에 들어가, 우리 가야 해

translation.en: No, we're not. Don't be ridiculous.
It's gonna take a lot longer than a minute.
It takes a few hours for the wards to cure.
So you keep your eyes open.
-[volume lowers] -Why do you think they're showing up now?
The Guild sent us to kill them. So we kill them.
It's actually a great question, Cal.
Good to know why you're doing the things you're asked to do.
translation.ko: 왜 요청받은 일을 하는지 알면 좋지

translation.en: We're monster hunters. That's why we do what we do.
translation.ko: 우린 괴물 사냥꾼이고 이게 우리 일이야

translation.en: But 25 years since the Guild came through and cleaned up
and now they're just back? Strange, right?
translation.ko: 갑자기 다시 나타난 게 이상하지 않아?

translation.en: It's strange it took them so long.
translation.ko: 진작 안 나타난 게 더 이상해

translation.en: Savannah's always tough to keep clean.

translation.ko: 수 세기 동안 계속된 폭력과 배신

translation.en: The cemetery we're going to now dates back three centuries.
Final resting place of over 10,000 souls,
including victims of the yellow fever epidemic
and graves desecrated by Sherman's army.
That's your big brother's way of saying
you can't keep a good ghost down.
[Calliope] I spend a lot of time pretending to be normal.
Normal families go to the movies,
have cookouts in the back yard.
Go fishing. Take trips to Disneyland.
Said you got a tip. What kind of tip?
Disturbed graves, exhumed bodies, some very human-looking teeth.
translation.ko: 훼손된 무덤, 발굴된 시체 인간과 유사한 이빨

translation.en: I love them. They don't beg, don't plead.
Don't ask a lot of questions.
-Lookout is a vital part of the job. -Keeping you safe
[Calliope] One day, I'm going to be the greatest hunter who ever lived.
translation.ko: 난 언젠가 최고의 사냥꾼이 될 거야

translation.en: And these clowns will simply be known as my brothers.
Theo was 12 when he made his first kill on a sweep with my dad.
translation.ko: 테오는 12살 때 아빠랑 나가서 첫 괴물을 잡았어

translation.en: he was 14 when he got his shot.
[Calliope] Me? I got my first chance last winter.
When am I gonna get another shot?
It's up to Mom and Dad.
Well, I'm at 19 kills and I'd like to make it 20.
translation.ko: 난 지금까지 열아홉 놈인데 스무 놈 달성하고 싶어

translation.en: -So let's hope there's actually some-- -[monster snarling]
Tasked with spotting monsters because I once missed one.
translation.ko: 저번에 한 번 실패했다고 이 신세지

translation.en: When hunting monsters, there are three rules.
translation.ko: 괴물을 사냥할 때 세 가지 규칙이 있어

translation.en: And always finish what you start.
translation.ko: 그리고 시작한 일은 반드시 끝낼 것

translation.en: Just clocked the first one. May be a ghoul.
Clocked the second one, you got two.
translation.ko: 한 놈 더 있어, 이제 둘이야

translation.en: Good, we each get our own.
Theo, you've got one two rows east, three graves north.
translation.ko: 테오, 동쪽으로 두 칸 북쪽으로 세 칸

translation.en: Apollo, yours is on the move, go left.
-[Calliope] See it, Theo? -Yep. About to go to work.
Theo? Do you hear me? There's a third ghoul.
translation.ko: 내 말 들려? 악귀가 세 놈이라고

translation.en: Yeah, you definitely had it, huh?
Mm-mm. I better see some salad on there too.
-So how'd it go? -Oh, you know, I did my thing, so...
Translation: two ghouls, we disposed of them in short measure.
translation.ko: 해석하자면 악귀 두 놈을 신속히 처리했어요

translation.en: And one vamp. It just came out of nowhere.
Really? A vampire in the same place as ghouls?
Yeah, the way it came at me was weird. Feral.
-Good thing Cal clocked it. -[Talia] Oh, good job, baby.
They didn't used to be so bold.
No wonder they sent us, huh? We'll get rid of them.
Love to finish a job before Pop gets home.
translation.ko: 아빠가 오기 전에 일을 끝내고 싶어요

translation.en: He hates it when we do that.
They keep telling me my time is coming.
translation.ko: 곧 내 차례가 올 거라고 하지만

translation.en: They don't understand that until it does,
I won't feel like a member of this family.
Bam! I stabbed it right in the chest, right?
The thing slides down my sword like meat on a skewer.
translation.ko: 꼬치에 낀 고기처럼 칼을 타고 내려왔죠

translation.en: You should let me go train at the Guild Academy right now.
-We'll be gone by Christmas. -I know, but...
it doesn't mean you shouldn't try, baby.
You're 16 once, Cal. You're allowed to have a life.
-If you let me show you. -Your turn is coming, baby.
translation.ko: - 기회를 주세요 - 곧 네 차례가 올 거야

translation.en: As usual, we're gonna go over our assignments,
translation.ko: 우린 이제 평소처럼 임무 받을 거야

translation.en: and as usual, Apollo will complain about his.
[Jack] Okay, I'll let you handle it, babe. See you soon.
[Talia] All right, let's see what we got.
Mm-mm. You have a job. It's called school.
Stop looking for something to be unhappy about, they're covers.
translation.ko: 너무 기분 나빠하지 마 그냥 위장 임무야

translation.en: I worked in that gym for six weeks. Punched the clock every day.
I'm sure the fact it was on a college campus full of pretty girls had nothing to do with your diligence.
translation.ko: 예쁜 여대생이 가득한 대학교에 있어서 간 건 아니고?

translation.en: -What does that even mean? -Whatever I need it to.
translation.ko: - 그게 대체 뭔데? - 뭐든지 될 수 있지

translation.en: You've gotta be kidding me. A trainer.
Oh, yeah, everybody can have a body like this.
translation.ko: 이런 몸 만드는 게 쉬운 줄 알아요?

translation.en: You want me to lose my religion tonight?
I know that's the adrenaline rush from that kill talking.
But you better watch your language in my house. Hear me?
[Theo] Plus, it's not a bad cover.
You get to talk about your favorite subject all day. You.
Mom, can I please tell him to go to hell?
Sure, if you got somewhere else to live.
-I was beginning to wonder. -Just been busy.
You know how moving in can be.
and spent my time making out with her behind the gym"?
Come on, Cal. Who is she?
-I'm not. -You used to be a better liar.
There was a moment, but we don't have a lot in common.
Hate that. Straight girls should come with a warning.
translation.ko: 너무 싫어 이성애자는 경고등 달아야 해

translation.en: No. Actually, I wanted to tell you.
I did it. I got my first kill.
Fam's planning a surprise celebration they think I don't know about.
Mom's calling to meet for dinner.
[Calliope] I'm from a lineage thousands of years old.
We're the best monster hunters to ever walk the earth.
And still, even though my family loves me,
Because there's a feeling you get
when a monster's breath eases up your nostrils.
There's a warning prickle on the back of your neck.
Pretend to be kind, pretend to be gentle, pretend to be human...
but I know exactly what you are.
Why else would you need these?
"Nearer, the plowed fields curved and faded
and the few hogs nosing in the furrows
Setting is never just a backdrop in a story. It's a character,
often the first one we meet.
It's important to note, then, the state...
[Calliope] My dad says that most hunters just know a monster when they see one.
translation.ko: 아빠가 그러는데 사냥꾼은 괴물을 알아볼 수 있대

translation.en: [Calliope] You just didn't look like one,
but you're the one they warned me about.
The kind that leads with a smile.
And there's only one way this story ends.
Wow, okay. Not wasting any time, huh?
And I've wanted to do that for a while now.
And would like to do it again?
There are only three rules for being a great hunter.
translation.ko: 훌륭한 사냥꾼이 되려면 세 가지 규칙이 있어

translation.en: [Juliette] There are only three rules for your first kill.
translation.ko: 첫 살인에는 세 가지 규칙이 있어
